document.full_text: in a little more than a week, josh thole is expected to fulfill a childhood dream when he will be introduced as the starting catcher for the mets on opening day.
document.title: mets' thole to put catching education to the test
lines_and_colors: in a little more than a week, josh thole is expected to fulfill a childhood dream when he will be introduced as the starting catcher for the mets on opening day.
